description: This file defines a Java class SetPinCodeResponseEvent extending ClusterCommandEvent, representing a response event for setting a PIN code in a mock Zigbee device cluster, including constructor and payload methods.

classes.name: SetPinCodeResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents a response event for setting a PIN code in a Zigbee cluster, encapsulating command ID and status.

methods.name: SetPinCodeResponseEvent
methods.description: Constructor initializing the event with cluster details and status.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Returns a byte array payload containing the status code.

calls: super(cluster.getEui64(), MockZigbeeDevice.HA_PROFILE, cluster.getEndpointId(), cluster.getClusterId(), cluster.isServer(), false, 0, SET_PIN_CODE_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID)
